question: You work at home and have a problem with a piece of equipment that you use for your job.Write a letter to the shop or company which supplied the equipment. In your letter-describe the problem with the equipment-explain how this problem is affecting your work-say what you want the shop or company to do
text: I am writing this with regard to inform you that my all in one copier machine which is recently bought it from your shop has been a malfunction. This equipment is really important for my work as I am currently working from home status.

As you know, nowadays, most people have to work from home so these types of equipment are very useful. That is why I bought a copier from your shop, a few days ago. This was not working suddenly and showing that 'Loading'. I am not sure what is the meaning is. However, my work is heavily stuck now because of this. As a salesman, I need to print out the documents, and I need to receive and send a lot of documents by fax. Therefore, this equipment is crucial to me.

I was trying to contact to your customer service centre and your staff told me that will send a technician to my place. So far, no one has contacted me yet. Thus, I have sent this letter to you for your further necessary action to be taken. Please send someone comes to check it and if it is a major issue, arrange with a new one to replace immediately.
I would be very grateful if you respond as soon as possible on this issue.
